-- auto-generated definition
CREATE TABLE wallet
(
  user_id INTEGER          NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT wallet_pkey
    PRIMARY KEY
    CONSTRAINT wallet_user_id_fkey
    REFERENCES clients
    ON DELETE CASCADE,
  balance NUMERIC(1000, 2) NOT NULL,
  bonus   NUMERIC(100, 2)  NOT NULL
);

-- auto-generated definition
CREATE TABLE events
(
  prov_id     INTEGER          NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT events_prov_id_fkey
    REFERENCES providers
    ON DELETE CASCADE,
  event_id    SERIAL           NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT events_pkey
    PRIMARY KEY,
  name        VARCHAR(100)     NOT NULL,
  date        TIMESTAMP        NOT NULL,
  tickets     INTEGER          NOT NULL,
  price       NUMERIC(1000, 2) NOT NULL,
  description VARCHAR(5000),
  tags        VARCHAR(1000),
  images      VARCHAR(5000),
  long        DOUBLE PRECISION,
  lat         DOUBLE PRECISION,
  duration    INTEGER
);

-- auto-generated definition
CREATE TABLE providers
(
  prov_id      SERIAL       NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT providers_pkey
    PRIMARY KEY,
  username     VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT providers_username_key
    UNIQUE,
  password     VARCHAR(60)  NOT NULL,
  full_name    VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  afm          VARCHAR(9)   NOT NULL,
  iban         VARCHAR(23)  NOT NULL,
  m_first_name VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  m_last_name  VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  m_phone      VARCHAR(10)  NOT NULL,
  phone        VARCHAR(10)  NOT NULL,
  postal_code  VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  address      VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  address_num  VARCHAR(4)   NOT NULL,
  city         VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  email        VARCHAR(355) NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT providers_email_key
    UNIQUE,
  subscription TIMESTAMP,
  long         DOUBLE PRECISION,
  lat          DOUBLE PRECISION,
  disabled     BOOLEAN,
  blocked      BOOLEAN,
  dept         NUMERIC(1000, 2)
);

-- auto-generated definition
CREATE TABLE clients
(
  user_id     SERIAL       NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT clients_pkey
    PRIMARY KEY,
  username    VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT clients_username_key
    UNIQUE,
  password    VARCHAR(60)  NOT NULL,
  first_name  VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  last_name   VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  postal_code VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  phone       VARCHAR(10)  NOT NULL,
  city        VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  address     VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  address_num VARCHAR(4)   NOT NULL,
  email       VARCHAR(355) NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT clients_email_key
    UNIQUE,
  long        DOUBLE PRECISION,
  lat         DOUBLE PRECISION,
  disabled    BOOLEAN,
  blocked     BOOLEAN
);


-- auto-generated definition
CREATE TABLE admins
(
  admin_id   SERIAL       NOT NULL
    CONSTRAINT admins_pkey
    PRIMARY KEY,
  username   VARCHAR(50)  NOT NULL,
  password   VARCHAR(60)  NOT NULL,
  first_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  last_name  VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  email      VARCHAR(355) NOT NULL,
  phone      VARCHAR(10)  NOT NULL
);
